content.rendered:
We’re growing and with that comes a brand new look!

Never before has our website looked so good. We’re very excited to be streamlining our ordering process, and we hope it’s easier than ever to order stickers.

Since our humble basements beginnings in 2011, Sticker Ninja has since experienced much growth and we owe it all to you! We love the opportunity to print your art and it warms our hearts to be your go to sticker people.  Thank you all for sticking with us! Our love for Portland and its art scene inspires us and we strive to bring you the highest quality stickers we can!
